SELECT production_receiving_reg_date , DATE_FORMAT(production_receiving_reg_date, '%Y-%m') production_receiving_reg_month , production_receiving_extended_price , production_receiving_name , c.client_name , production_receiving_note , IFNULL(SUM(production_receiving_extended_price), 0) production_receiving_sum FROM tb_production_receiving pr JOIN tb_work_order wo ON wo.work_order_seq = pr.work_order_seq JOIN tb_client c ON c.client_seq = wo.client_seq WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(production_receiving_reg_date, '%Y-%m'), production_receiving_reg_date WITH ROLLUP;
